term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - dose equivalent, H
term.title: dose equivalent

item.text: Product of the absorbed dose of ionizing radiation, a quality factor and a modifying factor to take into account the effect of radiation on different biological tissues.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 970 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
